price: Ye, iç, gözün aydın olsun! Əgər insanlardan kimisə görsən, de: “Mən Rəhman üçün oruc tutmağı nəzir etmişəm. Odur ki, bu gün heç kimlə danışmayacağam”.
arabic: فَكُلِي وَٱشۡرَبِي وَقَرِّي عَيۡنٗاۖ فَإِمَّا تَرَيِنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡبَشَرِ أَحَدٗا فَقُولِيٓ إِنِّي نَذَرۡتُ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ صَوۡمٗا فَلَنۡ أُكَلِّمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ إِنسِيّٗا

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakulī wa-ish'rabī waqarrī ʿaynan fa-immā tarayinna mina al-bashari aḥadan faqūlī innī nadhartu lilrraḥmāni ṣawman falan ukallima al-yawma insiyyan
